title: I Became a Soul-Predator - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Fantasy World   Ghosts   Male Protagonist   Nobles   Reincarnation
author: Panjak   판작
description:
It was a normal life.

Until my execution at the end of it….

But it seems that I became a little special after that.

I became a soul and traveled freely around the world.

I became a person again and became the center of the world.

This is the story of a great adventure that spans hundreds of years.>
